title: Welcome
aboutTitle: Life is an adventure. Capture every minute.
aboutText: There is something magical about a wedding. The emotions, the laughter, the happy tears and all other unique moments make every celebration truly special. Capturing those pure, genuine feelings is exactly why I do what I do. Creating images that bring back the joy and let you relive your day over and over again, that's my passion.
aboutSubText: ’m Daan — a wedding photographer based in Belgium with a passion for capturing real emotions and unforgettable moments. I may be new to wedding photography, but I’ve quickly fallen in love with the energy, joy, and emotion that fill every wedding day. For me, photography is all about people — the laughter, the happy tears, the quiet looks that say everything. I don’t believe in stiff poses or forced smiles; I want my couples to feel relaxed, have fun, and just be themselves while I document it all. While Belgium is home, I’m excited to bring my camera (and curiosity) across Europe, telling love stories wherever they happen. Every wedding is unique, and I can’t wait to capture yours — with honesty, warmth, and a little bit of adventure.
portfolioIntro: The most beautiful moments in our lives deserve the most beautiful photo's
galeryIntro: Some of the most beautiful weddings I got to be a part of.
servicesIntro: We provide a unique experience with attention to your needs.
contactIntro: Do you have any questions? Don’t hesitate to contact us.
